Z)  a magneto
bonusA: W)  DEFLECTION OF A COMPASS NEEDLE

tossupQ:
CHEMISTRY  Multiple Choice  Which of the following has the highest specific heat value: 
 
W)  wood 
X)  ice water 
Y)  sand 
Z)  gold
tossupA:
X)  ICE WATER 
 
(Solution:  wood = 0.42 Cal/g°C;  ice water = 0.5;  sand = 0.19;  gold = 0.031)
